description: Detects potential DLL files being downloaded using the PowerShell Invoke-WebRequest cmdlet
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Hieu Tran
name: Potential DLL File Download Via PowerShell Invoke-WebRequest
query: (process.command_line.text:("*Invoke\-WebRequest\ *" OR "*IWR\ *") AND process.command_line.text:"*http*" AND process.command_line.text:"*OutFile*" AND process.command_line.text:"*.dll*")
